forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. High 11C. Winds ESE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with a few showers this afternoon. High 52F. Winds ESE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers overnight. Low near 5C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
